grovepi

Class GrovePiI2CDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • grovepi.GrovePiI2CDevice

  • public class GrovePiI2CDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps I2CDevice with read/write that mirrors Windows 10 IoT Windows.Devices.I2c.I2cDevice. Retries I2C writes, and RuntimeException instead of checked IOException.
